turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to place a coffee order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok where do you want to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order it from the Starbucks on Cates Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Gingerbread Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is the largest size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A Venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I will take a Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What milks do they offer other than cow's milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They offer almond, coconut, and soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok I guess I want almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect and would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like extra sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, when do you want it ready for pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In about 20 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, I'll get the order sent and you will get the receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, the order has gone through, it will be ready for pickup in about 20 minutes.
